justification: Notes B’s title run but ignores B’s zero-RB tendency and preference for rookies (giving up young Xavier Rodriguez). Misreads A’s needs: A already has a Tier 1 TE (Adam Wilson), so ‘critical TE need’ is inaccurate. The swap downgrades A at RB and adds a low-value TE, while B already has adequate TEs. Rationale is brief and not grounded in roster/role context, playoff schedules, or byes. Overall ToM and internal coherence are weak.
